about_the_game:
※All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

＜About＞

Just as you begin to settle in for a fun day at your best friend's house, something changes in her and she kills you. And not just once—she ends your life time and time and time again.
Your goal is to escape from this endless loop of despair.

＜SYSTEM＞

■Jump through time to change your destiny!

The investigation portions of the game are rendered in three-quarter view.
Work toward your escape by searching rooms for the items and clues needed to solve puzzles and disarm traps. Time travel to obtain new, useful information capable of changing your destiny.
Your goal is to use the methods available to you and escape the never-ending loop of death.

■Your dear friend stalks toward you with a knife.Use the items at your disposal to escape!

Nemu may try to corner you while you're investigating a room.
Use the items around you to stop her and make your escape, otherwise you'll be killed and sent back in time!

■How many times must you be robbed of hope?!
Your actions will lead you to a number of different endings.
However, it seems like only sadness and despair await you each and every time. Will you really manage to escape this cycle of death?!

CHARACTER

・Noa Asahi (Voice: Honoka Kuroki）

・Nemu Tsukishiro　(Voice: Yuuki Takada）
・Akane Higuchi　 (Voice: Haruka Yamazaki）
・Suzuka Hayami (Voice: Satsumi Matsuda）

STAFF

・Character Design:MIZU

・Scenario:Takayoshi Muto(Synthese)
・Planner/Producer:Yujiro Usuda

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace, including: violent acts and gore with frequent expressions of blood, self-harm, suicide, and general adult content.

May contain content that is not suitable for all ages, including: partial nudity, sexual themes, heavy language, violent acts and gore with blood, self-harm, suicide.

All characters involved in sexual content are 18 years of age or older.

※All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

＜About＞

Just as you begin to settle in for a fun day at your best friend's house, something changes in her and she kills you. And not just once—she ends your life time and time and time again.
Your goal is to escape from this endless loop of despair.

The investigation portions of the game are rendered in three-quarter view.
Work toward your escape by searching rooms for the items and clues needed to solve puzzles and disarm traps. Time travel to obtain new, useful information capable of changing your destiny.
Your goal is to use the methods available to you and escape the never-ending loop of death.

■Your dear friend stalks toward you with a knife.Use the items at your disposal to escape!

Nemu may try to corner you while you're investigating a room.
Use the items around you to stop her and make your escape, otherwise you'll be killed and sent back in time!

Your actions will lead you to a number of different endings.
However, it seems like only sadness and despair await you each and every time. Will you really manage to escape this cycle of death?!

name: Sentimental Death Loop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6006U over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520 over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-enabled sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8500 over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-enabled sound card

short_description: Just as you begin to settle in for a fun day at your best friend's house, something changes in her and she kills you. And not just once—she ends your life time and time and time again.Your goal is to escape from this endless loop of despair.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
